name: Quick Count
description:
This is an educational mathematical quiz game made by a bunch of university students for their assignments. To win really all you have to do is COUNT QUICKLY (okay maybe not that quick, chill bro). just click the answer for the equation out of the 4 displayed options that you think is the right one. The whole game has a pixel art style and animation. 

credits : 

Programmer : Alexander Edwin

Artist : Grant Genesius Gunawan

Designer : Phillip Hoktato Yauwito

the game was made using Game Maker Studio.

all pixel art was made using Pixel.

the sounds were taken from the internet.
